meta.title: Salim Ben Hassine | Software Engineer, Fullstack Web Developer
meta.description: Software Engineer and Web Developer from Tunisia, based in Vienna Austria, with an expertise in FullStack web development, mastering multiple technologies. Frontend: Angular, React, VueJS, Backend: NodeJs, NestJS, Java EE, Spring, ASP.net
about.description7: years of experience in creating and designing of high quality
about.paragraph1: I am an accomplished software engineer with extensive expertise across a broad spectrum of frontend and backend technologies, frameworks, database systems, and best coding practices. My primary objective is to continually evolve as a software engineer, striving for excellence and aiming to be a standout performer in my field. I am dedicated to sharing and contributing my wealth of knowledge with fellow IT professionals.
about.paragraph2: My journey began when I successfully developed and hosted my first fully functional website at the young age of 15. Since that pivotal moment, I have delved into a diverse range of technology stacks, embarking on various software projects spanning multiple platforms.
about.paragraph3: Now, with over 13+ of immersion in the tech realm, complemented by 5 years of rigorous engineering studies and 5+ years of professional experiences across diverse companies and numerous projects, I possess the ability to create top-tier software. My work reflects the amalgamation of years of dedication, exploration, and honed expertise.

experience.title: Professional experiences
experience.description4: As Software Engineer within the Software Development team at RINGANA GmbH. My role involves leveraging cutting-edge technologies to enhance a range of internal and external online platforms for RINGANA. It is an Austrian-based company, specializes in crafting fresh, vegan natural skin care products and food supplements. With a team of over 400 employees and a global network of more than 70,000 RINGANA Partners.
